item.title: From Comey to ‘sandwich guy,’ federal grand juries get rare spotlight
item.description: The administration has struggled with an unusual level of rejections in some cases and procedural stumbles in others.

item.title: Trump wants a bigger White House ballroom. His architect disagrees.
item.description: The president and James McCrery had argued in recent weeks over the project’s size, with Trump pushing him to expand the ballroom.

item.title: After Trump pressure, Indiana lawmakers shift to convene on redistricting
item.description: State House Republicans say they will gavel in on Dec. 1, while the Republican-led state Senate will gather on Dec. 8. The state Senate leader had pre...

item.title: FBI seeks interviews with Democrats whom Trump called ‘traitors’
item.description: The Trump administration has aggressively sought to punish lawmakers who encouraged service members to disobey unlawful orders.

item.title: What comes next in the James Comey and Letitia James cases?
item.description: A judge’s ruling throwing out the cases against James Comey and Letitia James left several unanswered questions. Most significantly: What happens next...
